summary: Frontend testing completed for PDF Export and Attachments features. All features working correctly - PDF Export buttons work without JavaScript errors on all 4 entity detail pages (Vendor, Contract, PO, Tender). Attachments component displays correctly with upload area on all pages.

minor.issue: Returns 403 for some tenders - may be expected based on permissions
Returns 404 - related data endpoints may not exist

critical_code_review_comments: PDF Export fix verified: Changed from doc.autoTable() to autoTable(doc, ...) - working correctly
Attachments component integrated on all 4 detail pages with proper entity type mapping
Print button uses window.print() which triggers browser print dialog
context_for_next_testing_agent: PDF Export and Attachments features tested and working. Login requires setting localStorage via JavaScript API call due to form submission issues in Playwright.
